sentences.en: Abstract: Mandarin is a tonal language.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 汉语普通话是一种带声调的语言.

sentences.en: Are the melodies modal , tonal, or post - tonal?
sentences.cn: 他们是中古教会调式, 音调得, 后音乐调式?
原因六:汉语语调稀奇古怪.

sentences.en: Folk music everywhere seems to be tonal.
sentences.cn: 各地的民间音乐看来都是有调性音乐.

sentences.en: Had side key, enterprise website begins a plan function, layout, tonal.
sentences.cn: 有了侧重点, 企业网站就开始策划功能 、 布局 、 色调了.

sentences.en: In a document copying machine, a copy having tonal arrangements as on the original.
sentences.cn: 在资料复印机中, 色调层次同原件相同的复制件.

sentences.en: In a half - tone , it is those areas having tonal value of 30 % - 75 %.
sentences.cn: 在 半色调 图片内, 它是30%75%点的部份.

sentences.en: In a negative copy the tonal values are reversed.
sentences.cn: 在音像拷贝中,色调值是反转的.

sentences.en: In tonal music it is next in importance to the tonic.
sentences.cn: 在调性音乐中,其是仅次于主音的重要调.

sentences.en: Middle tones ( Mid tones ): Tonal ranges between highlights and shadows.
sentences.cn: 中间色调: 在光部和暗部间的色调范围.

sentences.en: String, tonal to stringed instrument stand or fall is having main effect.
sentences.cn: 琴弦, 对于弦乐器音色的好坏起着重要的作用.

sentences.en: The erhu has a pretty amazing tonal and dynamic range . Ms.
sentences.cn: 二胡拥有令人称奇的漂亮音色和多样的演奏方式.
音调的音质为 “ 音色 ”

sentences.en: The tonal range she uses is wide and varied.
sentences.cn: 她使用的色调丰富多彩。

sentences.en: There are also separate rules observed for negative tonal modification.
sentences.cn: 否定音变的变调也另有规律可循.

sentences.en: This means that its tonal center, is the tonic.
sentences.cn: 这也就是说作品的调性中心就是该音阶的主音.
